content.p: You can access information on this page relating to assessment regulations, student regulations, academic appeals and misconduct, student complaints and calculator guidance in assessment. Read the universityâ€™s assessment regulations for the completion of assessed coursework, exams and mixed assessments. Find regulations governing conduct and progress in studies. Find out what constitutes academic misconduct before starting your assessments. Receive guidance and support with the student complaints procedure. The university has a series of regulations related to student conduct and it is essential that all students familiarise themselves with these regulations View our policy on academic appeals.
